alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 17 at 1:37AM MDT until October 17 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Flathead/Mission Valleys and West Glacier Region. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. 1 to 3 foot waves expected on Flathead Lake.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; West Glacier Region
